comments.content:
DIN Cond Med

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DINCondMedAsWHAT_4108.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-next/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-next/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-next/")  
is close but the waist on \_R\_ is too low, center vertex of \_W\_ is level with the outer strokes, and there are other differences.  
Don

Loft Light

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LoftLightAsWHAT_4784.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/loft/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/loft/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/loft/") is close but the center vertex of \_M\_ is on the baseline and center vertex of \_W\_ is level with the outer strokes, and there are other differences.  
Don

Driver Gothic

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DriverGothicAsWHAT_6743.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/driver-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/driver-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/driver-gothic/") but the \_I\_ has serifs, and there are other differences.  
Don

Good find Lex!  
I wonder what Just van Rossum used as his source.  
Don

It's always reminded me of these [plastic lettering templates](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306/http:/www.littlecraftybugs.co.uk/craft-supplies/stationery/lettering-stencils/plastic-letter-stencils-mini-block.html) I had as a kid.

- Lex

Could explain the naive mechanical shapes of the letters. Would have needed a stencil with narrow letters.  
Don

The closest smooth letter equivalent of FF confidential could perhaps be Corpa Gothic Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CorpaGothicBoldAsWHAT_4920.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/brassfonts/corpa-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/brassfonts/corpa-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/brassfonts/corpa-gothic/")  
Don
